======= Rooting =======
----------- Description -----------
Compute a midpoint newick rooted tree.
------------ Dependencies ------------ Bioperl perl-bioperl_ 1.6.924, Conda version
.. _perl-bioperl: https://anaconda.org/bioconda/perl-bioperl
----------------- Workflow position -----------------
**Upstream tool**
=========== ========================== ======= Name output file(s) format =========== ========================== ======= fastme Newick tree Newick =========== ========================== =======
---------- Input file ----------
Newick file Input tree file
---------- Parameters ----------
Output name Output base name for the ouput files
------------ Output files ------------
Output_name Resulting tree rooted in newick format
Output_name.log Log file
------------ Dependencies ------------ Rooting CIRAD tool. Contact jean-francois.dufayard@cirad.fr
---------------------------------------------------
